meanings.definition: Relating to or lasting for a period of ten years.
meanings.sent1: The decennials celebration brought together friends and family for a special event.
meanings.sent2: The decennials report highlighted the changes over the past decade.
meanings.sent3: The decennials party was so big that it lasted for days!
meanings.sent4: The decennials milestone marked a significant point in their history.
meanings.sent5: The decennials anniversary was a memorable occasion for everyone involved.

meanings.sent1: The decennials comet passes by Earth once in a decade.
meanings.sent2: The decennials census provides crucial data every ten years.
meanings.sent3: The decennials reunion always brings back fond memories.

meanings.sent5: The decennials occurrence is eagerly anticipated by many.
